
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.


find_package(c-ares REQUIRED)

add_library(cpp-coroutine-dns)
target_compile_options(cpp-coroutine-dns PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_link_libraries(cpp-coroutine-dns PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  c-ares::c-ares
  cpp-coroutine-engine
  library-cpp-cache
)
target_sources(cpp-coroutine-dns PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/library/cpp/coroutine/dns/async.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/library/cpp/coroutine/dns/cache.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/library/cpp/coroutine/dns/coro.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/library/cpp/coroutine/dns/helpers.cpp
)
